title: Christmas Gift Guide 2018: Stocking fillers | Trusted Reviews
description:
![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

If you want to fill the stockings of your loved ones with chocolates and
satsumas that is a worthy tradition to uphold.

But in case you’re looking for a little more variety, we’ve put together a
list of great stocking fillers – from the cheap to the downright extravagant.

## Stocking fillers under £20

### [Stardew Valley £14.99](https://amzn.to/2EXZ6lp)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2EXZ6lp)

Giving someone Stardew Valley is like giving them a gentle massage without the
effort or physical contact. A simple game that sees players restore and expand
a rundown farm in a small village, to a gentle electronic soundtrack, it’s one
of the most relaxing games out there. You may not be able to really escape the
city to live on an idyllic farm, but this will make you feel like you have.
Available for PC, Nintendo Swith, Xbox, and PS4.

  * **Read our[Stardew Valley review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/stardew-valley)**
  * [**Buy Stardew Valley, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2EXZ6lp)

### [Case Mate Waddler iPhone Case £4.95](https://amzn.to/2F097i6)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2F097i6)

Every stocking needs a gimmick gift – and this one is both a gimmick and
genuinely useful! Phone cases get ragged and old and need replacing, and why
not with a rubber penguin?

  * **Read our[Case Mate Waddler iPhone Case review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/case-mate-waddler-iphone-case) **

## Stocking fillers under £50

### [HTC One M9 Dot View case **£15.58**](https://amzn.to/2P6CQKI)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2P6CQKI)

A phone case that does more than just protect your phone, this Dot View case
displays notifications using a retro dot matrix UI. It also lets you play
games through the cover, and control music playback, and it’s available in a
range of colours.

  * **Read our[HTC One M9 Dot View case review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/htc-one-m9-dot-view-case)**
  * [**Buy a HTC One M9 Dot View case, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2P6CQKI)

### [When in Rome **£24.99**](https://amzn.to/2P0MnTw)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2P0MnTw)

Bringing the family board game into 2018, When in Rome is a family friendly
board game driven by Amazon’s Alexa that’s entertaining both as a game and an
auditory experience. There’s no need to keep score – Alexa does that for you –
so players can concentrate on winning, and appreciating the genuinely great
voice acting on display.

  * **Read our[When in Rome review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/when-in-rome)**
  * [**Buy When in Rome, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2P0MnTw)

## Stocking fillers under £100

### [GHD Air **£99.00**](https://amzn.to/2yL3tuy)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2yL3tuy)

A hairdryer – even a really good one – might not be exciting enough for some
people to be a real present, but as the one functional thing in a stocking of
fun, it’s perfect. And when it comes to haircare, you can’t get better than
GHD. It’s powerful, well-designed, and perfect for controlling an unruly mane.

  * **Read our[GHD Air review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/ghd-air)**
  * [**Buy a GHD Air, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2yL3tuy)

### [Nintendo Switch Pro Controller **£54.99**](https://amzn.to/2JAWRTy)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2JAWRTy)

While the Switch’s versatile JoyCons are great in their own way, sometimes you
want a proper solid handset. But since the Pro Controller isn’t included with
the console, plenty of people are getting by without them. Well, Christmas is
a time to help someone have that little extra luxury they couldn’t quite
justify for themselves – so treat your loved one to a slightly more
comfortable gaming experience.

  * **Read our[Nintendo Switch Pro Controller review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/nintendo-switch-pro-controller) **
  * **[Buy a Nintendo Switch Pro Controller, Amazon](https://amzn.to/2JAWRTy) **

## Stocking fillers under £200

### [Tivoli Andiamo **£189.00**](https://amzn.to/2SFcfmk)

![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)

Just a really pretty bluetooth speaker. Just really ridiculously good looking.
Sleek speakers with a nice little strap that lets you hang it up wherever you
want, it’s simple yet elegant. It’s no slouch on sound quality either, giving
a much richer tone than you’d expect form a speaker of its size, and the
battery lasts an impressive 20 hours.

  * **Read our[Tivoli Andiamo review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/tivoli-andiamo)**
  * [**Buy a Tivoli Andiamo, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2SFcfmk)

### [Fujifilm Instax Square SQ6 £113](https://amzn.to/2JxIbox)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2JxIbox)

Instax cameras have been around for a while now and they’re as popular as ever
– and looking really good. The design of the SQ6 is incredibly stylish, with
several colours available, including a Taylor Swift edition if that takes your
fancy, and the bigger square pictures give more range than the smaller,
portrait ones.

  * **Read our[Fujifilm Instax Square SQ6 review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/fujifilm-instax-sq6)**
  * [**Buy a Fujifilm Instax Square SQ6, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2JxIbox)

### [Snapchat Spectacles 2 £149.99](https://amzn.to/2P8uaUp)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2P8uaUp)

Snapchat Spectacles are exactly the degree of frivolity you want in a
stocking. Spectacles! Just for Snapchat! Well, not just for Snapchat – you can
post the footage and photos you record through the Spectacles wherever you
want – after you’ve downloaded them via Snapchat. So essentially they’re a
comfortable, easy to use point-of-view camera, for all your point-of-view
needs.

  * **Read our[Snapchat Spectacles 2 review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/snapchat-spectacles-2-3410068)**
  * [**Buy Snapchat Spectacles 2, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2P8uaUp)

## Expensive stocking fillers

### [Tefal Actifry Genius XL £174.99](https://amzn.to/2CWk6X2)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2CWk6X2)

More than just a chip machine, the Actifry lets you cook a wide range of
dishes, with room enough to cook five main meals at once. It nine auto cook
settings, but also lets you cook manually – which really means it’s as
creative as you are.

  * **Read our[Tefal Actifry Genius XL review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/tefal-actifry-genius-xl)**
  * [**Buy a Tefal Actifry Genius XL, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2CWk6X2)

### [Sonos Beam £399.00](https://amzn.to/2P3JGR7)

[![](https://ksassets.timeincuk.net/wp/uploads/sites/54/2017/07/trusted-
reviews-placeholder-3.svg)](https://amzn.to/2P3JGR7)

The first Soundbar from Sonos, the Beam might just be one of the best on the
market. It simplifies TV watching by letting you control your TV through the
bar, it integrates with Alexa – it does away with the need for any other
speakers in your living area. The soundbar is available on its own, or as part
of a 5.1 surround sound home theatre system.

  * **Read our[Sonos Beam review](https://www.trustedreviews.com/reviews/sonos-beam)**
  * [**Buy a Sonos Beam, Amazon**](https://amzn.to/2P3JGR7)
